full_text: Bae Be es IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2021/KER/7 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE P.SOMARAJAN MONDAY, THE O4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2021 / 14TH POUSHA, 1942 Crl1.MC.No.2846 OF 2014 AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 790/2013 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS , KAYAMKULAM CRIME NO.348/2012 OF Vallikunnam Police Station , Alappuzha PETITIONER: ACCUSED DR.SURESH BABU AGED 56 YEARS S/O.RAMAN PILLAI, NARAYANEEYAM HOUSE, WARD NO.VIII,PATHANAMTHITTA PANCHAYATH, PATHANAMTHITTA VILLAGE, PATHANAMTHITTA DISTRICT. BY ADVS. SRI.B.RAMAN PILLAI (SR.) SRI.R.ANIL SRI.T.ANIL KUMAR SRI.MANU TOM SRI .M. SUNILKUMAR SRI.SUJESH MENON V.B. SRI.THOMAS ABRAHAM (NILACKAPPILLIL) SRI .M. VIVEK RESPONDENTS: STATE & DEFACTO COMPLAINANT 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM- 682 031. 2 SADANANDAN S/O.NARAYANAN, KONNATH EDAPPURAYIL, MANJADITHARA MURI, PALLIKKAL P.O., BARANIKAVU VILLAGE. R1 BY ADV.SRI. RAMESH CHAND, PUBLIC PROSECUTOR R2 BY ADV. SRI.VINCENT JOSEPH THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 04.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: as ees Crl.MC.No.2846 OF 2014 202UKER/7 2 ORDER The offences alleged are under Section 420, 423, 465, 468 of IPC. The matter settled out of court. An affidavit sworn by the defacto complainant produced to show the settlement arrived at out of the Court. Hence, if it is proceeded further, it will not serve any purpose. Hence, the FIR and its further proceedings are quashed. The Crl.M.C. is allowed accordingly. Sd/- P.SOMARAJAN JUDGE SPV Coprere eC bales Cr1.MC.No.2846 OF 2014 202U/KERIT 3 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A THE CERTIFIED COPY OF CMP NO.2289 OF 2012 OF THE COURT OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE, KAYAMKULAM.
